attributes.action: Remove looters, rioters and anarchists from our society
attributes.additional_details:
Looters, rioters and anarchists should be removed from our society to give us the chance to prevent the same problems in the next generation and to enable the decent people of this nation to return to a life of much-reduced intimidation and threats to personal safety.

Deport the looters, rioters and anarchists for an indefinite term to some remote patch of British land, preferably a remote island, that they cannot leave until they have been re-educated and are prepared to respect a democratic society, whatever it's perceived faults.

It's worked before - it's called Australia.
